topics.name: Functions
topics.description: Writing and calling functions in code.

topics.name: Center of mass
topics.description: Calculating the center of mass for irregular bodies and systems.

tags.name: numeric
tags.description: The answer format is one or more numerical values.

tags.name: symbolic
tags.description: The answer format is a symbolic expression.

tags.name: drawing
tags.description: The answer format requires drawing on a canvas to input a graphical representation of an answer.

tags.name: MC
tags.description: The answer format is choosing from a small finite set of answers (multiple choice, possibly with multiple selections allowed, up to 10 possible answers).

tags.name: code
tags.description: The answer format is a piece of code.

tags.name: multianswer
tags.description: The question requires multiple answers, either as steps in a sequence or as separate questions.

tags.name: graph
tags.description: The question tests reading information from a graph or drawing a graph.

tags.name: concept
tags.description: The question tests conceptual understanding of a topic.

tags.name: calculate
tags.description: The questions tests performing a numerical calculation, with either a calculator or equivalent software.

tags.name: compute
tags.description: The question tests the writing and running of a piece of code to compute the answer. The answer itself is not the code, but could be a numeric answer output by the code, for example (use `code` when the answer is the code).

tags.name: software
tags.description: The question tests the use of a specific piece of software (e.g., Matlab).

tags.name: estimation
tags.description: Answering the question correctly will require some amount of estimation, so an exact answer is not possible.

tags.name: secret
tags.description: Only use this question on exams or quizzes that won't be released to students, so the question can be kept secret.

tags.name: nontest
tags.description: This question is not appropriate for use in a restricted testing environment, so only use it on homeworks or similar.
